name: TimeCompliance macOS Kiosk App
tagline: Full-screen compliance kiosk app concept for workforce time entry (Apple Silicon).
highlights: Designed for full-screen kiosk workflow with guided actions and reminders.
Built for compliance-friendly logging and repeatable execution.

name: AD / Finance User Cross-Check
tagline: Automation concept to reconcile finance platform users against inactive AD accounts.
highlights: Compares multiple data sources and generates action-ready reporting.
Designed for auditability and simple re-runs.

name: Fantasy Football Draft Overlay Toolkit
tagline: OBS-friendly overlays driven by Sheets for draft analytics and hype visuals.
highlights: Turns live spreadsheet data into stream-ready visuals.
Automates updates and formatting for draft day.
